name: Treasure Huntress: No Cupcake Day
description:
Hi, everyone! 

This is a game I've been doing for the past month. It's a smol(in and out, 20 minutes adventure) platformer with basic mechanics. Controls are featured in game but I'll list all of them here anyway(there is some additional ones here too):

<-, ->, A, D - horizontal movement

S, ↓ - crouch

X, K, Space, W, ↑ - jump

Z, J, Right Mouse Button - dash

C, L, Left Mouse Button(Press and Hold)  - grab a ledge, grab a box, interact with switch platforms and key stands

R(Hold) - level reset, return to main menu from score

Hope You'll like it >.<
